call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Community Chat - September 25th

topics.title: HTX Exchange Extortion Scandal and Community Response
topics.summary: Discussion of HTX exchange demanding $100k to prevent delisting, publishing evidence of extortion practices, and creating a GitHub repository for other projects to share similar experiences. The community response gained over 200,000 views on social media and exposed systematic extortion tactics.

topics.title: Sub-blocks DevNet Testing and Protocol Updates
topics.summary: Sub-blocks DevNet is progressing well with mempool and node wallet support mostly complete. The system is being stress-tested with transaction bombing and shows good advancement toward full implementation.

topics.title: ErgoScript Capabilities and Bulletproofs Implementation
topics.summary: Development of ErgoScript examples including global transfer policies and bulletproofs verification. These demonstrate the core protocol's capabilities for cryptographic applications and smart contract functionality.

topics.title: ChainCash Development and AI Agent Integration
topics.summary: ChainCash basis tracker demo is in development with planned Telegram wallet integration. The system aims to serve human communities and AI agents in peer-to-peer networks, potentially replacing many existing DeFi tokens.

topics.title: Community Fundraising and Development Bounties
topics.summary: Two successful fundraising campaigns raised 7,000 ERG for development. The first bounty was assigned to implement a full Ergo-3 interpreter in Rust within the Sigma Rust repository.

topics.title: Dexy-based USD Stablecoin Planning
topics.summary: Technical implementation of Dexy-based stablecoin is ready, with discussions focused on governance aspects like update key management and burning protocols. The project aims to attract users from outside the crypto ecosystem through efficient arbitrage possibilities.

topics.title: Rosen Bridge Bitcoin Integration via RUNE Protocol
topics.summary: Rosen Bridge developed a technique to enable bidirectional Bitcoin swaps using the RUNE protocol. Previously, Bitcoin integration was one-way only, but now tokens and coins can be brought back onto Bitcoin itself.

topics.title: Atomic Swaps Development and Limitations
topics.summary: Discussion of atomic swap capabilities with various projects including Komodo DEX integration. While multiple atomic swap implementations exist as demos, adoption remains limited due to complexity and user experience challenges.

topics.title: Development Updates: Nautilus, Hermes, and ErgoProtica
topics.summary: Multiple project updates including Nautilus wallet improvements, Hermes mempool streaming service, ErgoProtica R&D progress with PR contracts and bullet proofs testing, and ChainCash demo development.

topics.title: Rosen Bridge UI and Runes Integration
topics.summary: Rosen Bridge team improved UI kit and implemented ESLint configuration for code consistency. Full rune integration allows bringing runes to other chains for marketplace activity and liquidity provision beyond simple token mimicking.

topics.title: Wallet Localization and Gaming Updates
topics.summary: Nautilus wallet added Javanese and Malaysian language support. Game of Prompts updated judge system to handle unlimited participants instead of 20-50 limit. IOSPOR developed async stream parsing for sensitive transaction data storage.

topics.title: Vampire Strings Identity Architecture Concept
topics.summary: Discussion of vampire strings concept for identity management where bad actors in identity chains can be eliminated along with all downstream identities they granted. This provides a decentralized solution to identity trust and revocation.

topics.title: Exchange Strategy: BitGet and DEX Integration
topics.summary: Strategy to access major exchanges like BitGet for free by providing liquidity on Ethereum or BSC pools. BitGet and Coinbase now integrate DEX tokens automatically through AI filters, eliminating traditional listing fees.

topics.title: Kraken Listing Strategy and Rosen-ERG
topics.summary: Kraken requires holders and liquidity metrics for listing consideration. Rosen-ERG presents a viable path forward with a Paideia vote to spread liquidity across Cardano for meeting Kraken's requirements.

topics.title: Cyberverse Game Massive Upgrade
topics.summary: Cyberverse is down for major upgrade featuring P2P combat, stat systems, leveling mechanics, inventory management, and skill systems. The upgrade represents significant evolution from the original Ergo integration game.

topics.title: Developer Recruitment and Platform Positioning
topics.summary: Need for more developers and different marketing approach positioning Ergo as a neutral settlement layer for digital economies rather than typical crypto marketing. Focus on human communities, AI agents, and peer-to-peer networks.

topics.title: Economics Community Outreach Strategy
topics.summary: Strategy for engaging academic economists who are skeptical of crypto due to cartoonish Bitcoin maximalist messaging. Ergo's deterministic approach to money could appeal to economists seeking scientific rigor in monetary systems.

topics.title: ChainCash Collateralization and Risk Management
topics.summary: Discussion of ChainCash's flexible collateralization system where individual parties can set their own risk profiles and acceptance criteria. This prevents system-wide failures by allowing diverse risk management approaches.

topics.title: Silver-backed Currency Implementation
topics.summary: Concept for implementing US constitutional silver currency using ChainCash with specific token IDs and collateralization ratios. Mobile apps would be essential for peer-to-peer transactions in local exchange trading systems.

topics.title: ChainCash Reputation System and Distributed Banking
topics.summary: Discussion of reputation systems for ChainCash note issuers and the concept of vendors acting as distributed banks. Need for on-chain reputation challenges and defense mechanisms to prevent fraud and maintain trust.

topics.title: ChainCash vs Traditional DeFi Tokens
topics.summary: ChainCash can replace broken DeFi token economics by tying supply to demand using off-chain cash backed by Ergo reserves. This eliminates the need for additional tokens while solving supply inflation problems.

topics.title: Colorado Springs Meetup Announcement
topics.summary: Upcoming Ergo meetup in Colorado Springs is open to the public with no tickets required. Plans to promote at local universities and provide accommodations for attendees. Event will be permissionless and welcoming.
